Text: RE April Liquidation QZ Cc to be an adjustment in TAGG because both the FT ONT and FT NY books have captured this value and received the offsetting liquidation If the IM NY and IM ONT books have offsetting value you can roar reclass the difference Original Message From Mausser Gregory Sent Thursday May AM To Little Jr Jim Cc Love Phillip Bowen Melba Subject April Liquidation QZ Jim Were you able to locate this liquidation for April I realize it has been booked in TAGG between FT books however can you somehow get the value in IM Ontario Let me know if I can provide you with any additional information that will help resolve this issue Forwarded by Gregory A MausserHOUECT on AM Gregory A Mausser PM To Jim CT cc Phillip M CT Subject April Liquidation QZ Jim P Love informed me that we should see a liquidation QZ in the Ontario Region intended to offset an Interdesk deal between IM Ontario and IM New England where we forced the purchase Looks like it was booked in TAGG between FTOntario and FTNY Can we find the liquidation and show in IM Ontario Thanks Greg

RE April Liquidation QZ Cc to be an adjustment in TAGG because both the FT ONT and FT NY books have captured this value and received the offsetting liquidation If the IM NY and IM ONT books have offsetting value you can roar reclass the difference Original Message From Mausser Gregory Sent Thursday May AM To Little Jr Jim Cc Love Phillip Bowen Melba Subject April Liquidation QZ Jim Were you able to locate this liquidation for April I realize it has been booked in TAGG between FT books however can you somehow get the value in IM Ontario Let me know if I can provide you with any additional information that will help resolve this issue Forwarded by Gregory A MausserHOUECT on AM Gregory A Mausser PM To Jim CT cc Phillip M CT Subject April Liquidation QZ Jim P Love informed me that we should see a liquidation QZ in the Ontario Region intended to offset an Interdesk deal between IM Ontario and IM New England where we forced the purchase Looks like it was booked in TAGG between FTOntario and FTNY Can we find the liquidation and show in IM Ontario Thanks Greg

RE April Liquidation QZ Cc to be an adjustment in TAGG because both the FT ONT and FT NY books have captured this value and received the offsetting liquidation If the IM NY and IM ONT books have offsetting value you can roar reclass the difference Original Message From Mausser Gregory Sent Thursday May AM To Little Jr Jim Cc Love Phillip Bowen Melba Subject April Liquidation QZ Jim Were you able to locate this liquidation for April I realize it has been booked in TAGG between FT books however can you somehow get the value in IM Ontario Let me know if I can provide you with any additional information that will help resolve this issue Forwarded by Gregory A MausserHOUECT on AM Gregory A Mausser PM To Jim CT cc Phillip M CT Subject April Liquidation QZ Jim P Love informed me that we should see a liquidation QZ in the Ontario Region intended to offset an Interdesk deal between IM Ontario and IM New England where we forced the purchase Looks like it was booked in TAGG between FTOntario and FTNY Can we find the liquidation and show in IM Ontario Thanks Greg

RE Posting and the ADAMichelle I have schedule with Twanda for Wednesday the th at pm Thanks again Jim Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Thursday October PM To Little Jr Jim Subject RE Posting and the ADA Happy to talk with you about the ADA Ive actually written two papers on the topic and edited an article in The Houston Lawyer on your very topic albeit several years ago which was before the Supremes spoke on the issue On the Senior Specialist position I am happy to discuss that with you as well Please get with my assistant Twanda Sweet at to schedule a time next week to talk Michelle Original Message From Little Jr Jim Sent Thursday October PM To Cash Michelle Subject Posting and the ADA My name is Jim Little I am a forth year Enron employee and a third year student at South Texas College of Law I am writing in response to a posting with your group for a Sr Legal Specialist The posting itself contains no information about the job other than the fact that it is in the Labor and Employment Department I realize the expectation may be that I contact the recruiter directly however I felt efficiency would be served in contacting you directly I would appreciate any information you may provide including both duties and necessary qualifications I would also appreciate you considering speaking with me in the near future concerning a paper I am writing about individuals with HIV and the protections they are afforded under the ADA I feel comfortable that Enron has addressed this issue and I am merely guessing that you would have been involved in such discussion or have familiarity through your various writings on the ADA I am still researching the topic so it will be a few weeks before I would feel able to ask intelligent questions But I would appreciate knowing at this time if this is something you are able and willing to discuss Thank you for your time Jim Little x

Posting and the ADAMy name is Jim Little I am a forth year Enron employee and a third year student at South Texas College of Law I am writing in response to a posting with your group for a Sr Legal Specialist The posting itself contains no information about the job other than the fact that it is in the Labor and Employment Department I realize the expectation may be that I contact the recruiter directly however I felt efficiency would be served in contacting you directly I would appreciate any information you may provide including both duties and necessary qualifications I would also appreciate you considering speaking with me in the near future concerning a paper I am writing about individuals with HIV and the protections they are afforded under the ADA I feel comfortable that Enron has addressed this issue and I am merely guessing that you would have been involved in such discussion or have familiarity through your various writings on the ADA I am still researching the topic so it will be a few weeks before I would feel able to ask intelligent questions But I would appreciate knowing at this time if this is something you are able and willing to discuss Thank you for your time Jim Little x
